review: My 2yr old kid fell down, wounded his forehead and was bleeding through a deep cut. We were worried on how and where to take him in this pandemic situation and citywide lockdown. Dr.Deevish advised us to visit him immediately and checked out my kid. He treated him patiently and applied sutures in his clinic. Doctor was very helpful and shared detailed information during follow up visits as well, regarding scar reduction. My kid is recovering well and wound is also healing without any significant scar. Thank you Dr.Deevish.
reply_text: Thank u very much for those kind words.. Wish him a speedy recovery. Take care.

review: My 6 year old daughter had a fall from her cycle and injured her chin. We were lucky enough to get in touch with Dr. Devish at Prakriya hospital. He was very calm, dealt with my daughter with patience, ensured she was comfortable and completed the suturing very well. Post care was also very good including the suture removal and guidance. Definitely recommed him!
The DR approach towards explaining the treatment and about the procedure in a layman language to the patient was quite impressive.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: A very clear explanation about the issue and post care instructions . Doctor listens and responds very patiently. Appreciate. Thank you
